original_text: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;
korean_text: 믿는 자들에게는 이런 표적이 따르리니 곧 그들이 내 이름으로 귀신을 쫓아내며 새 방언을 말하며

sentences.original_text: And these signs shall follow them
In my name shall they cast out devils
sentences.korean_translation: 내 이름으로 그들은 귀신을 쫓아낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: they shall speak with new tongues
